Will Smith sa hrá na Batmana. Nahláškovaný trailer pre Bad Boys for Life sľubuje pokračovanie, na ktoré sme čakali skoro 20 rokov
05 Nov 2019, 16:14 by Dominik Vetrák

Trailer je plný explózií, hlášok, akcie a skvelej chémie medzi Martinom Lawrenceom a Willom Smithom.

Od premiéry Bad Boys 2 od Michaela Baya ubehlo už viac ako 16 rokov. Tak dlho sme čakali,  na dvojicu Mike-Marcus. A stále im to šliape nadmieru dobre. Chémia medzi hercami sa vôbec nevytratila a my si tak môžeme užívať hláškovania našich obľúbených hrdinov. Režisér Adil El Arbi a Bilall Fallah (obaja natočili Black, Patser a ďalšie, pričom sa upísali aj Policajtovi z Beverly Hills 4) sa snažili zachovať Bayov vizuál a my sme zatiaľ viac než spokojní. 
Dej nás zavedie do obdobia, keď Mike (Smith) stále aktívne poľuje na zločincov a udržiava sa v top forme, zatiaľ čo Marcus sa už teší na dôchodok a dennodenné riskovanie života ho už nebaví, obzvlášť, keď sa musí starať o rodinu. Mikeovi tak pridelia nový tím.



Volá sa AMMO a bude skladať z hercov, ako Vanessa Hudgens, Charles Melton, Paola Nunez a Alexander Ludwig, známy zo seriálu Vikingovia (stvárňuje v ňom postavu Bjorna, najstaršieho z Ragnarových synov). Mikea sa však niekto pokúsi zabiť, a tak poprosí svojho parťáka, aby sa naposledy vydali na nebezpečnú cestu plnú výbuchov, zbraní, sexy žien, hlášok a mŕtvol.
Film režíruje už spomínaná dvojica Adil El Arbi a Bilall Fallah, scenár napísal Peter Craig (Top Gun: Maverick) a slovenská i česká premiéra je plánovaná na 16. januára (leden) 2020. Ďalšie informácie o filme nájdeš v tomto vlákne.

text:
Will Smith plays Batman. The acclaimed trailer for Bad Boys for Life promises a sequel that we have been waiting for almost 20 years
05 Nov 2019, 16:14 by Dominik Vetrak

The trailer is full of explosions, buzz, action and great chemistry between Martin Lawrence and Will Smith.

It has been over 16 years since Michael Bay's Bad Boys 2 premiere. We've been waiting so long for Mike-Marcus. And it's still going very well. Chemistry among the actors has not disappeared at all and we can enjoy the rumors of our favorite heroes. Director Adil El Arbi and Bilall Fallah (both filmed Black, Patser and others, also signed to Beverly Hills Cop 4) have tried to preserve Bay's visuals and we are more than satisfied.
The story takes us to a time when Mike (Smith) is still actively hunting for criminals and keeping himself in top form, while Marcus is already looking forward to retirement and his daily risk of life no longer enjoys him, especially when he has to take care of his family. This gives Mike a new team.



It's called AMMO and will consist of actors like Vanessa Hudgens, Charles Melton, Paola Nunez, and Alexander Ludwig, known from the Vikings series (portraying Bjorn, the eldest of Ragnar's sons). But Mike tries to kill himself, and asks his partner for the last time on a dangerous journey full of explosions, weapons, sexy women, buzz, and corpses.
The film is directed by the aforementioned pair Adil El Arbi and Bilall Fallah, the script was written by Peter Craig (Top Gun: Maverick) and the Slovak and Czech premiere is scheduled for January 16 (January) 2020. More information about the film can be found in this thread.
